wcs.core

Class Common

  • java.lang.Object
    • wcs.core.Common

  • public class Common
extends java.lang.Object
    Collections of utils supporting common idioms. You need to import static wcs.core.Common.* to use them.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      Common()

      static java.lang.String nn(java.lang.String s)
